t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. t: Requirements and tips for enrolling a brand in Amazon Brand Registry - Sell on Amazon
s: June 4, 2024 - Brand name discrepancies: Ensure that the brand name you provide during enrollment matches the trademark text exactly. Pay attention to spaces and symbols to prevent discrepancies. t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites
